body:
Ayy guys. Today is my 16th birthday, and I thought I might as well go with the crowd and make a birthday AMA.

Ask me stuffz.
body_tagged:
Ayy guys. Today is my 16th birthday, and I thought I might as well go with the crowd and make a birthday AMA.

Ask me stuffz.
title: Birthday AMA

replies.body:
What's your fav color?
What's your fav food?
replies.body_tagged:
What's your fav color?
What's your fav food?

replies.body:
Happy Birthday! :D

Favourite song(s) at the moment?
Plans for today?
replies.body_tagged:
Happy Birthday! :D

Favourite song(s) at the moment?
Plans for today?

replies.body:
Happy Birthday Cyn <3

Did you get cake?
If so, what flavor?
replies.body_tagged:
Happy Birthday Cyn <3

Did you get cake?
If so, what flavor?

replies.body:
Happy Birthday!!
Chocolate filled donut or donut filled chocolate?
Where do you live?
replies.body_tagged:
Happy Birthday!!
Chocolate filled donut or donut filled chocolate?
Where do you live?

replies.body:
@resepignev Color would be either black or red, and food is lasagna, no doubt.

@FrostedCupcakez You're gonna kill me for liking these, but probably "The Spirit of Radio" by Rush and "Carry on Wayward Son" by Kansas, to name a few.

@Kyoal Um, do you mean presents? :P I was hoping for "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney" above everything, and my parents managed to find that 15-year old game. They're awesome.

@Interparallel Oh, please, that's why I live for birthdays! I got a chocolate one with oreo frosting.

@DaFrozenBlaze Is both an option? ;) And I live in the Eastern United States.

@Midnightstorm 
But I like vanilla, too :P

@Random_Pet So far, so good :)

replies.body:
Happy Birthday!

If you were stuck on a deserted island and were forced to eat only one thing for the rest of your life, what would it be?
replies.body_tagged:
Happy Birthday!

replies.body: I could answer that question so easily

replies.body:
@MidnightBeats I want to say cookies, but then I'd just end up hallucinating, so I'll say pasta and/or lasagna :P

@Newcleus Honestly, my opinion's been pretty back-and-forth lately. And I know what wink emoticon is insinuating ;)
